title: Seduced
description: Book 1 in the EVIL LOLITA series.Newlywed Victor Cavanaugh doesn’t mind that his wife Sarah is a travel magazine photographer and has to be out of town often. Having just made partner at his law firm, his schedule is hectic as well. But when his seventeen-year-old stepdaughter begins her relentless attempts at seducing him, Vic isn’t safe anywhere. Beth may look like the proverbial golden child on the outside but her desires run dark. Trying his best to resist her aggressive pursuit leads Vic down a path he’s avoided for so many years--a path that's cost him one marriage already. When the death of one of Beth’s friends starts looking less like a drug overdose and more like a homicide, Vic will be caught in a web of lies he can’t escape. As the truth unravels, he’ll be forced to choose between protecting Beth from a dangerous enemy or saving himself. *Erotic Suspense. Mature adult content.From Early Reviewers;-A powerful debut unlike anything else I've read in this genre. -Amy, Proof & Beta Reader-The definition of a guilty pleasure read. Victor's story had me hooked from the very beginning! -Katie G.
author: Trinity Scott
